title: Help Omeluum Investigate the Parasite
content:
ge, new power. To calm it down, Omeluum is willing to trade us a Ring of Mind-Shielding.

Quest Complete Description

We've acquired Omeluum's Ring of Mind-Shielding. It might protect its wearer from the parasite's influence We left the area before Omeluum could help. We'll need to find a cure somewhere else. We picked a fight with the Society of Brilliance - Omeluum won't be helping us now. Omeluum died. We'll have to keep looking for a way to deal with the parasite.
